breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Berry Parfait
breakfast.instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, honey, and granola in a bowl. Top with chia seeds.

lunch.name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
lunch.instructions: Combine chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, and onion. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano. Toss with dressing and top with feta.

dinner.name: Caprese Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms
dinner.instructions: Brush mushrooms with olive oil, season with salt and pepper. Grill 5 minutes per side. Top with tomato, mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze. Serve over quinoa.

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Scrambled Eggs
breakfast.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lime juice, salt, and pepper. Scramble eggs in butter. Spread avocado on toast, top with eggs and red pepper flakes.

lunch.name: Asian-Style Vegetable Stir-Fry
lunch.instructions: Heat sesame oil in wok. Stir-fry vegetables for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, ginger, and garlic. Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds.

dinner.name: Lemon Herb Pasta with Roasted Vegetables
dinner.instructions: Roast vegetables with 2 tbsp olive oil at 400Â°F for 15 minutes. Cook pasta according to package directions. Toss pasta with remaining olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, and zest. Add roasted vegetables, parsley, and parmesan.

friday_evening: Cook quinoa and brown rice in batches
Make balsamic glaze if not store-bought
sunday_morning: Prepare avocado toast and scrambled eggs

goal_alignment_analysis.general_health: This meal plan supports general health with balanced macronutrients, plenty of vegetables, and moderate portions
goal_alignment_analysis.allergy_compliance: All meals are completely nut-free and avoid all tree nuts and peanuts
goal_alignment_analysis.vegetarian_inclusion: 100% of meals are vegetarian, featuring diverse plant-based proteins and nutrients
goal_alignment_analysis.budget_efficiency: Moderate budget achieved through seasonal produce, pantry staples, and minimal processed foods
goal_alignment_analysis.time_management: All meals require 18 minutes or less preparation time, perfect for quick weekend cooking
goal_alignment_analysis.variety_achievement: High variety accomplished through different cuisines (Mediterranean, Asian, Italian) and cooking methods
goal_alignment_analysis.nutritional_adequacy: Provides adequate protein, fiber, and essential nutrients while maintaining caloric balance
